document.full_text: the justice department is close to a deal that would allow google inc to buy an airline ticketing software company while requiring that the software remain available to google rivals, according to a source close to the deal.
document.title: google-ita decision may be just days away: source
lines_and_colors: the justice department is close to a deal that would allow google inc to buy an airline ticketing software company while requiring that the software remain available to google rivals, according to a source close to the deal.
